sentences.sContent: Only flow .... The power is IN the flow, and each drop of water is pliant and soft.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only flow .... The power is IN the flow, and each drop of water is pliant and soft.
sentences.sCn: 只是流动……力量就在流动中，每一滴水都是顺从的，柔软的。

sentences.sContent: A new, more pliant prime minister took over.
sentences.sContent_eng: A new, more pliant prime minister took over.
sentences.sCn: 新上任的首相也更加顺从。

synos.tran: 顺从的；[木]易弯的；易受影响的；能适应的
